## Part I

Sum up numbers next to a symbol. 

::: {.panel-tabset}

#### R

```{r}
dig = gsub("[^[:digit:]]", replacement = ".", x = txt)
sym = gsub("[[:digit:]]", replacement = ".", x = txt)
sym = gsub("[^\\.]", replacement = "*", x = sym) 
head(dig)
head(sym)
```
